description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Pune, India. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: India Vibrant Pune City Escape with Sophisticated Sky Lounge
hotels.description: Toe the line between old and new and lose yourself in the excitement of a thriving metropolis with an escape to Crowne Plaza Pune City Centre, an IHG Hotel - the perfect getaway to explore all that Koregaon Park has to offer. Visit the famed Osho International Meditation Resort, wander palaces forgotten by time, or saunter in tranquil nearby gardens. Then, head to Evviva Sky Lounge for sweeping vistas of Pune and delicious cocktails or rejuvenate in the dazzling outdoor pool.

hotels.title: West India Pune City Escape with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Embrace the excitement of a thriving metropolis with an escape to Novotel Pune Nagar Road - the perfect getaway to explore all that the bustling Viman Nagar district has to offer. Make the most of your coveted location just moments from the city's finest restaurants, trendy boutiques and cultural landmarks, including the historic Aga Khan Palace. The hotel's modern rooms offer a tranquil escape from the city's lively rhythm, while the state-of-the-art fitness centre and shimmering pool provide a perfect balance of relaxation and rejuvenation. Venture beyond the hotel to explore Pune's rich history and dynamic culinary scene.

seo.title: Hôtels à Pune - India Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Pune, India avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
